title: Valorant Character Tier List
description: Discover the top Valorant agents ranked in S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier. Find out which agents are dominating the meta and learn their strengths and weaknesses for competitive play.
heading: Valorant Character Tier List
introText: Discover the top Valorant agents ranked in S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier. Find out which agents are dominating the meta and learn their strengths and weaknesses for competitive play.

data.itemDescription: Highly mobile and versatile agent with strong dueling abilities
Excellent fragger with self-sustain and strong impact potential
Provides strong map control and utility denial, especially in defense
Great versatility with map control and strong team utility
Good fragging potential and self-sustain abilities
Essential support agent with healing and crowd control abilities
Strong in gathering intel and providing map control, but lacks direct combat impact
Good at area denial and fragging, but relies heavily on explosives
Excellent utility for initiating fights and disrupting enemies, but requires coordination
Requires strong map knowledge and coordination to be effective, lacks direct impact in combat
Provides good area control and utility, but can be predictable and countered easily
Offers decent support and utility, but lacks standout strengths compared to other agents
